metadata.title: CVE-2019-7146 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In elfutils 0.175, there is a buffer over-read in the ebl_object_notefunction in eblobjnote.c in libebl. Remote attackers could leverage thisvulnerability to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted elf file, asdemonstrated by eu-readelf.

criterions.comment: elfutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
